_header: If thy russet hood oppose my red hood
_description: Translation of Latin, in a schoolbook — one couplet

OxfLinLat129.Transcription:
Yff þi russet hode oppose my rede hodeMy rede hode schal answere
                    thy russet hoode
OxfLinLat129.Note:
Translating ‘Si tu cuius capicium est elbidum opponas in cuius
                        capicium est rubeum Ego cuius capicium est rubeum respondebo tibi cuius
                        capicium est elbidum, which follows.
